description: time: another attempt to fix windows build

messages.text:
Hello bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/4967067/diff/4001/src/pkg/time/zoneinfo_windows.go
File src/pkg/time/zoneinfo_windows.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/4967067/diff/4001/src/pkg/time/zoneinfo_windows.go#newcode74
src/pkg/time/zoneinfo_windows.go:74: Year:   z.year,
I had originally converted it to this form too but reverted it, trying to minimize the diff size and keep my opinions out of other people's code.

Glad you agree.  :)

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=902201d20e3a ***
